entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Keep ref struct interfaces behind preview flag #73923
    17.12
  • Autoformatting messes up indentation when starting a new line #73921
  • Proposal: flow attributes on parameters and type parameters to compiler-generated code #73920
  • `allows ref struct` generic can't be tested with `is` #73918
  • "Invert if" does not properly enclose an entire `#region`/`#endregion` #73917
    Backlog

Closed

  • Syntax coloring broken after updating to 17.10 #73862
    17.11
  • Proposal: Flow attributes on primary constructor parameters to generated fields #73899
  • VS 17.10.0 preview 4 shows warnings where no Error is. #73802

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve EnC log messages #73919
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73915
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add documentation to Values property in TypedConstant struct #73912
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Update TSAConfig.gdntsa #73924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix NFWs due to BG SG system in non C#/VB languages #73922
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Editorconfig options enumerator refactoring #73907
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Avoid running generators when nothing has changed in a compilation tracker. #73897
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix wrong sorting in `AbstractSpellCheckingHandler.cs` #73913
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Throw when there is a syntax version mismatch in codelens #73902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update the code style package to build against Roslyn 4.8 #73900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
